title: JSON schema for Spectrum CSS component metadata
description: A validation schema for the Spectrum CSS component metadata.

sourceFile.description: The path to the source file used in generating the metadata.

selectors.description: These are the selectors available for the component.

modifiers.description: These are the modifiers available for the component.

component.description: The component-level custom properties for the component.

global.description: The global custom properties used in this component as generated by the design tokens.

system-theme.description: The system theme hooks created by the postcss tooling to allow theme toggling on a component.

passthroughs.description: Modifier custom properties for nested components that are passed through by this component.

high-contrast.description: Custom properties that allow high-contrast styles to be applied to the component.
